comment:
трупы аколитов, позади них аколит со взорванной башкой
успех чека медикае

languages.text: Солдаты убиты выстрелами в спину — похоже, их застрелил собственный товарищ, последним зарядом вышибший себе мозги.

traits.locale_text: Солдаты убиты выстрелами в спину — похоже, их застрелил собственный товарищ, последним зарядом вышибивший себе мозги.

languages.text: These soldiers were killed by shots in the back — it seems they were executed by their own comrade, who then used his last charge to blow his own brains out.
languages.original_text: Солдаты убиты выстрелами в спину — похоже, их застрелил собственный товарищ, последним зарядом вышибший себе мозги.

traits.locale_text: These soldiers were killed by shots in the back — it seems they were executed by their own comrade, who then used his last charge to blow his own brains out.
These soldiers were killed by shots in the back — it seems they were executed by their own comrade, who then used his last charge to blow his own brains out.
These soldiers were killed by shots in the back — it seems they were executed by their own comrade, who then used his last charge to blow his own brains out.
These soldiers were killed by shots in the back — it seems they were executed by their own comrade, who then used his last charge to blow his own brains out.

languages.text: 这群士兵是被人从身后开枪打死的。看起来，应该是被他们自己的战友处决了。处决他们的人用最后的子弹，打爆了自己的脑袋。
languages.original_text: These soldiers were killed by shots in the back — it seems they were executed by their own comrade, who then used his last charge to blow his own brains out.

traits.locale_text: 这群士兵是被人从身后开枪打死的。看起来，应该是被他们自己的战友处决了。处决他们的人用最后的子弹，打爆了自己的脑袋。

languages.text: Estos soldados murieron por disparos por la retaguardia. Parece que fueron ejecutados por su camarada, que usó la última bala para volarse la cabeza.
languages.original_text: These soldiers were killed by shots in the back — it seems they were executed by their own comrade, who then used his last charge to blow his own brains out.

traits.locale_text: Estos soldados murieron por disparos por la retaguardia. Parece que fueron ejecutados por su camarada, que usó la última bala para volarse la cabeza.

languages.text: この兵士たちは背中を撃たれて死んでいる。同胞の手によって処刑されたようだが、彼も最後の一発を自分の頭に向けて自殺したようだ。
languages.original_text: These soldiers were killed by shots in the back — it seems they were executed by their own comrade, who then used his last charge to blow his own brains out.

traits.locale_text: この兵士たちは背中を撃たれて死んでいる――同胞の手によって処刑されたようだが、彼も最後の一発を自分の頭に向けて自殺したようだ。

languages.text: Diese Soldaten wurden durch Schüsse in den Rücken getötet – anscheinend eine Hinrichtung durch ihren eigenen Kameraden, der sich dann mit der letzten Ladung den eigenen Schädel weggeblasen hat.
languages.original_text: These soldiers were killed by shots in the back — it seems they were executed by their own comrade, who then used his last charge to blow his own brains out.

traits.locale_text: Diese Soldaten wurden durch Schüsse in den Rücken getötet – anscheinend eine Hinrichtung durch ihren eigenen Kameraden, der sich dann mit der letzten Ladung den eigenen Schädel weggeblasen hat.

languages.text: Ces soldats se sont fait tirer dans le dos. Ils semblent avoir été exécutés par l'un de leurs camarades, qui a ensuite retourné sa propre arme contre lui.
languages.original_text: These soldiers were killed by shots in the back — it seems they were executed by their own comrade, who then used his last charge to blow his own brains out.

traits.locale_text: Ces soldats se sont fait tirer dans le dos. Ils semblent avoir été exécutés par l'un de leurs camarades, qui a ensuite retourné sa propre arme contre lui.

languages.text: Bu askerler, arkalarından vurularak öldürülmüş. Görünen o ki kendi yoldaşları tarafından infaz edilmişler. Ardından da o yoldaşları, son mermisini kendini başından vurmada kullanmış.
languages.original_text: These soldiers were killed by shots in the back — it seems they were executed by their own comrade, who then used his last charge to blow his own brains out.

traits.locale_text: Bu askerler arkalarından vurularak öldürülmüş. Görünen o ki kendi yoldaşları tarafından infaz edilmişler, ardından da o yoldaşları son atışını kendi beynini patlatmakta kullanmış.
